alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 10:45AM EDT until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .The Wabash River will continue a slow rise through the weekend, with an expected crest at New Harmony on Monday around 4 feet above flood stage. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.1 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
